violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer name 'Михаил' collected at 15.450s, operator repeated it at 16.630s but never requested confirmation ('Верно?', 'Правильно?'). City 'Екатеринбург' collected at 11.170s, operator repeated at 12.450s without confirmation. Phone '912-666-9332' repeated at 04:13.353 and 07:06.710 without confirmation request.

violations_detected.title: Long information search - FLAG ONLY
violations_detected.evidence: Operator announces search ('Час-минуту') at 36.760s, delivers information at 1:01.383s. Total search duration: 24.623 seconds (within acceptable 40s limit)

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for contact data verification
coaching_priorities.recommendation: After collecting and repeating customer's name, city, and phone number, MUST ask for explicit confirmation: 'Верно?', 'Правильно?', 'Подтверждаете?' and wait for customer to confirm ('Да', 'Верно', 'Угу')

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting: 'Здравствуйте, компания 7964 Колеса. Меня зовут Анна. Как можно к вам обращаться?' includes company name, operator name, and offer to help. Proper closing: 'Спасибо за звонок. Всего доброго. До свидания.'

7.2.evidence: Contact data (name, city, phone) collected and repeated but NO confirmation request ('Верно?') made
7.2.note: Operator repeated all data back but failed to ask for explicit confirmation

7.3.evidence: Intro at 0.650s (< 5s), disconnect estimated at ~2s after last speech (< 5s)

6.1.evidence: No critical silence >45s leading to customer hangup. Operator ended call professionally

9.3.evidence: Operator thanked customer for waiting: 'Спасибо за ожидание' at 1:01.383

3.1.evidence: Customer's refund issue was addressed by escalating to manager. Operator offered to reserve tires and provided callback time.
3.1.note: Customer expressed frustration but accepted the resolution plan. Borderline case but operator provided clear next steps

3.6.evidence: Operator searched system before providing information, used 'сейчас', 'минуту' before searching

5.1.evidence: Operator provided pickup addresses, delivery info, promotions, booking number (964-003), callback time (9:30), phone confirmation

10.2.evidence: Logical information flow, script followed, promotions offered, proper reservation process

10.3.evidence: Used customer name 'Михаил' consistently, built rapport, maintained conversation control, proper opening/closing, asked 'Чем-то могу ещё помочь вам?' at end

10.6.evidence: Complete information provided: tire specifications, prices, promotions, delivery options, pickup locations, booking process

2.1.evidence: No service refusal, call ended professionally by operator after confirming no additional needs

1.1.evidence: No profanity or rudeness detected from operator. Professional tone maintained throughout

4.1.evidence: Handled frustrated customer professionally, maintained composure, repeated explanations patiently
4.1.note: Text indicators show good customer handling. Full assessment would require audio tone

positive_observations: Excellent professional greeting with company name (7964 Колеса), operator name (Анна), and offer to help
Used customer name 'Михаил' consistently throughout call showing good rapport building
Thanked customer for waiting after search ('Спасибо за ожидание')
Handled frustrated customer professionally and patiently explained refund escalation process
Offered proactive solution by reserving tires while refund is being processed
Provided comprehensive information about promotions, delivery options, and pickup locations
Proper closing with gratitude and offer for additional help
Good timing compliance: started greeting within 1 second of call start

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps available for echo method detection. Some customer speech has lower confidence scores but overall quality is sufficient for assessment.
